about_the_game:
In this open world, stealth game you play as Garett the Ferret the newest badguyer around, work your way up the corporate ladder to become one of the worst people to ever live, but acquiring this won't be easy, sneak through warehouses, murder Dogooders, steal from civilians, shoplift and more, all just for the sake of your psychotic individuality.

Features:

  • Traverse the city and interact with civilians

  • Take jobs from your bosses and commit them out in the world

  • Use your DoBad Promotional Credits to climb higher on this hellish corporate ladder

  • Decorate and expand your very own hideout

WARNING ALL ACTS OF MURDER, THEIVERY, WAR CRIME, AND DEVIOUS BEHAVIORS ARE PURELY ENTERTAINMENT!

content_descriptors.notes: This game is about crimes. So there will be crimes. All crimes are depicted in a silly and goofy manner.

name: DoBad Inc

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+ (or later)
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Violência Extrema
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: Commit crimes without consquences in our brand new indie game DoBad Inc.! You play as Garett the Ferret the newest badguyer around, work your way up the corporate ladder to become one of the worst people to ever live.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
